SELECT COALESCE( MAX( MSG_NO+1 ), 1 ) AS MSG_NO FROM MESSAGE
INSERT INTO MESSAGE( MSG_NO , MSG_ROOM , MSG_TYPE , MSG_FROM , MSG_TO , MSG_TEXT , MSG_RECEIVE , MSG_DELETE , MSG_DATE ) VALUES( #{msgNo} , #{msgRoom} , #{msgType} , #{msgFrom} , #{msgTo} , #{msgText} , 1 , 1 , NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT MSG_NO , MSG_ROOM , MSG_TYPE , MSG_FROM , MSG_TO , MSG_TEXT , MSG_RECEIVE , MSG_DELETE , MSG_DATE , MBR_NICK , MBR_PROFILE FROM ( SELECT * FROM MESSAGE WHERE MSG_TYPE = #{type} AND MSG_DATE > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 DAY) ) MESSAGE JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MBR_ID = MESSAGE.MSG_FROM ORDER BY MSG_NO ASC
SELECT MSG_NO , MSG_ROOM , MSG_TYPE , MSG_FROM , MSG_TO , MSG_TEXT , MSG_RECEIVE , MSG_DELETE , MSG_DATE FROM MESSAGE WHERE MSG_TYPE='public' ORDER BY MSG_NO DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT MSG_NO , MSG_ROOM , MSG_TYPE , MSG_FROM , MSG_TO , MSG_TEXT , MSG_RECEIVE , MSG_DELETE , MSG_DATE , MBR_NICK , MBR_PROFILE FROM ( SELECT * FROM MESSAGE WHERE MSG_NO = ( SELECT MSG_NO FROM MESSAGE WHERE MSG_FROM = #{msgFrom} AND MSG_TO = #{msgTo} ORDER BY MSG_NO DESC LIMIT 0,1 ) ) MESSAGE JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MBR_ID = MESSAGE.MSG_FROM

SELECT MSG_NO, MSG_FROM, MSG_TEXT, MSG_DATE, COALESCE(MSG_COUNT,0) AS MSG_COUNT, MBR_NICK, MBR_PROFILE FROM ( SELECT * FROM ROOM WHERE ( ROOM_FRUSER = #{id} AND ROOM_FRSTATE = 1 ) OR ( ROOM_SEUSER = #{id} AND ROOM_SESTATE = 1 ) ) ROOM JOIN ( SELECT MSG_NO, MSG_ROOM, MSG_TEXT, MSG_DATE , CONCAT( IF(MSG_FROM=#{id},'',MSG_FROM), IF(MSG_TO=#{id}, '', MSG_TO) ) AS MSG_FROM FROM MESSAGE WHERE MSG_NO IN ( SELECT MAX(MSG_NO) MSG_NO FROM MESSAGE GROUP BY MSG_ROOM ) ) MESSAGE ON MESSAGE.MSG_ROOM = ROOM_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MSG_ROOM, COUNT(*) AS MSG_COUNT FROM MESSAGE WHERE MSG_TO = #{id} AND MSG_RECEIVE = 1 GROUP BY MSG_ROOM ) MSGCOUNT ON ROOM.ROOM_NO = MSGCOUNT.MSG_ROOM JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MBR_ID = MESSAGE.MSG_FROM ORDER BY MSG_DATE DESC
